subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: It was a day of seemingly lucky bounces, as Penn State seemed to get all the breaks in a home victory against Purdue and Miami avoided its first-ever 0-3 start in conference play.
snippet: It was a day of seemingly lucky bounces, as Penn State seemed to get all the breaks in a home victory against Purdue and Miami avoided its first-ever 0-3 start in conference play.
